I got an exclusive look at Meta's revolutionary Orion AR glasses and it is WILD. This isn't your typical VR headset - they're lightweight true AR glasses that blend the digital and physical worlds seamlessly. While still in development, Orion feels like a genuine leap forward in computing. I also got  to interview the CTO of Meta, Andrew Bosworth AKA Boz about the development of the Meta Orion.

Chapter Titles:
0:00 What is Meta Orion?
2:54 Meta Quest 3S
3:38 Using Orion
5:31 Interview with Boz
title: The WILDEST Tech I’ve Ever Tried
